column1: QUESTIONS
Where to send the queries related to portal and approval related issues for the approval
process 2021-22?
Does AICTE allow Arts and Science Courses in an Institution offering Engineering
Courses?
Is it mandatory for an Institution offering Courses in Architecture and Pharmacy to
obtain Approval from AICTE?
Whether establishment of a new Technical Institution to offer Courses in Engineering
and Technology is permissible in Academic Year 2021-22?
Whether MCA/ MBA Department of Arts and Science College is eligible to apply for
AICTE approval?
Whether AICTE approval is needed for running MCA Course in our Arts and Science
College?
Can we apply for closure of the existing Institution and open a new Institution at the
same premises?
Whether a New Institution is obligated to appoint a Principal and Faculty at the time of
application for approval or subsequent to approval before commencement of the
Course? Whether the Faculty to be appointed are for the First Year of the Course or for
the entire period of the Course?
We have been granted LoI in 2020-21 and LoA was rejected. How can we get LoA this
year?
We have got the first approval for our Institution in 2020-21. But we have NOT admitted
students due the delay in getting affiliation. Do we need to apply for EoA?
While applying, I had made a mistake in opting for FN/OCI? How can I Rectify the
mistake?
We had applied for the Closure of the Institution, but now we have decided to apply for
EoA. How can I revert the application?
We had 25 years of Live Lease at the time of our approval for establishment of a new
Technical Institution, currently our Live Lease is 5 years. What should we do to get the
EoA?
Our Institution was given Withdrawal of Approval in 2018-19. We are not able to apply
under 2021-22 application.
The Institution has been placed under 20% reduction for 2020-21. How to get the full
Intake in 2021-22?
Our Institution was placed under No admission/ No EoA/ Reduction in Intake category in
the previous year. We are not able to create 2021-22 applications.
Our Institution got approval up to the Academic Year 2018-19 and we were unable to
submit application in 2019-20 and 2020-21. We want to apply for 2021-22.
We have taken approval from AICTE for the Engineering Courses in 2011-12. After that
we could not take EoA from AICTE due to some reasons. Now we want to apply for EoA
in 2021-22. We have ID and password allotted by AICTE in 2011. Should we continue to
fill our application on Web Portal of AICTE using that ID and Password?
We have not applied for EoA in the past 3 years. Can we apply for Break in EoA as well
as for a new Programme?
Our Intake was reduced to 50% due to the enrollment less than 30% in the past 5 years
consecutively. The student admission this year is more than 30%. Should we have to
apply for Restoration in 2021-22?
I would like to convert from Diploma to Degree Level and vice-versa. How to do the
same?
We have 5 Diploma Courses, Can we apply for conversion of Two Diploma Courses
only into Degree Courses?
We are having UG and PG Courses in Engineering and Technology. We would like to
apply for conversion of our Under Graduate Courses into Diploma Level? Should we
have to apply for closure of PG Courses?
We would like to apply for conversion of our UG Degree Courses into Diploma Courses,
but we don’t find the nomenclature of certain Courses in Annexure 3. How can we
apply?
We are an Engineering Institution started in 2014-15 with an Intake of 300 seats. We
want to start MBA and MCA Courses in the same Institution with same ID. What is the
procedure?
When an existing Institution applies for a new Programme, whether it have to comply
with the built up area and Infrastructural requirements of the new Programme only for
First year and/ or for the entire duration of the new Programme? Whether the existing
Institution and the new Programme can share the administrative and amenities areas by
creating exclusive Instructional area for the new Programme?
Whether the existing Institution is entitled for starting only one new Programme and/ or
more than one new Programme in diploma, degree and PG? For example the existing
engineering Institutions wish to start a new Programme of Diploma in Engineering and
UG Design, whether it is possible?
Whether an Institution offering MBA could be merged with an Institution offering
Engineering Courses?
Can we merge two Institutions located within same Campus/City?
Can we merge few Courses of a Child Institution with Parent Institution and run the
Child Institution with the remaining Courses?
Can we merge an Institution running Under Graduate Courses and a Polytechnic in
Engineering?
We would like to apply for Conversion of Women’s Institution into Co-ed Institution. But
the enrollment in the last three years is not less than 60%. Are we eligible to apply for
the same?
How can we apply for Courses in Emerging /Multidisciplinary Areas in Engineering and
Technology?
How can we apply for addition seats in Indian / Regional Languages at Diploma/Degree
level Courses in Engineering and Technology?
We have One Course with valid NBA accreditation. How many increase/ new Course
our Institution is eligible?
Our Institution has valid NBA accredited Courses. Is it necessary to upload valid NBA
letter on portal and send hard copy to Regional Office?
Our Institution has applied for NBA, whether we are eligible for adding a new Course?
Our Institution has obtained Provisional Accreditation for two Courses which are valid till
2019. I have used these Courses for adding two new Courses during 2018-19. If my
Institution secures Provisional accreditation again during 2019 for the same Courses,
can I apply for the introduction of New Course/ increase in Intake using it.
Our Institution has obtained Accreditation for two Courses which are valid till 2018. I
have used these Courses for adding two new Courses during 2017-18. If my Institution
got the renewal of accreditation again after inspection during 2018 for the same
Courses, can I apply for the introduction of a New Course/ increase in Intake using it?
Our Institution is not eligible to apply for NBA accreditation. But we want expansion/
new Courses. How can we apply?
Our Engineering Institution started in 2017-18. Could you kindly help with the
information on applying for new Courses?
We don’t have accreditation, but we would like to add two Courses one with 30 Intake
and another with 60 Intake by closing a Course with 90 Intake. Is this permissible?
Is there any limit on the addition of number of new Courses in lieu of closing existing
Course(s)?
We are offering Courses in Design Programme. We are not eligible to apply for NBA.
How can we apply for new PG Course?
Whether a few of the existing Courses shall be continued, while introducing few new
Courses?
Whether the maximum permissible Intake after the closure of certain existing Courses
and introduction of certain new Courses shall be the existing Intake of the academic
year 2020-21 or the maximum of 300?
Whether the Faculty and the Infrastructural facilities for the new Course and / or
increase in Intake in the existing Course are to be for the First Year of the new Course
and / or increase in Intake or for the entire duration of the new Course and / or Intake?
Our Institution is not eligible to apply for NBA accreditation and we have 5 Courses with
total Intake of 300. Can we start a new Course by closing one existing Course?
We are a private Polytechnic Institution approved last year, running 5 branches with 300
Intake. Now we want to apply for Increase in Intake and add for new Courses. How
many Courses we can add?
Is Integrated M.E./ M.Tech. Programme permitted?
We are offering Courses in Engineering and Technology. We would like to offer allied
Vocational Courses. What is the procedure?
Can we merge Production Engineering Course with Intake 60 and Mechanical
Engineering Course with Intake 60, to offer a single Course in Mechanical Engineering
with Intake 120?
We have Three Divisions in Computer Science Engineering and Three Divisions in
Information Technology. Can we get Six Divisions in Computer Science Engineering
after merging?
Can we merge B.E. Electrical Engineering Course with B.E. Computer Science
Engineering Course?
We want to apply for reduction in Intake within a Division for certain Courses. What is
the maximum number of UG and PG Courses, we can opt for reduction?
We, Polytechnic Institution, want to reduce the Intake one of Course namely Electronics
and Telecommunication Engineering from 60 to 30. Can we do the same?
Our Institution wants to change the name of the Course. What is the procedure?
Our Institution has become a University. Do we have to apply as a new University under
Chapter I or can we apply for EoA as a University?
In a State, if one University is merged with another University (by State Government),
how to change the name of the affiliating University under Course Tab
Name of our affiliating University does not appear in the affiliating University drop down
Our Institution was approved as a Private/ Un-aided Institution. Recently our Institution
has been recognized as minority Institution. How to update this change in AICTE
Portal?
Our Institution has extended EoA up to 2022. When we apply in the Portal for Increase
in Intake, the Portal is calculating the TER Charges. Are we not exempted from
payment?
What is the last date of submission of hard copy application at Regional Office for the
applications?
Whether a State Technical University is required to take approval of AICTE to conduct
Technical Courses
Ours is a Deemed to be University/ Private University established under UGC Act
offering Technical Programmes but not seeking approval from AICTE. What is the
procedure for getting the Programmes approved by AICTE?
Our University is 07 years old Private University approved by UGC. Whether Private
University running technical Programmes/ Courses in Engineering, Management,
Architecture, MCA, etc. are required to obtain AICTE approval?
We are Standalone Institutions offering PGDM Courses. Can we apply for ODL and/or
Online Courses?
We would like to apply for a new Course, but the nomenclature is not available in the
drop down. How to apply?
Is Adjunct Faculty being considered for the requisite Faculty Student ratio?
Whether Faculty not recruited on Regular basis shall be considered for Faculty Student
ratio?
Can we convert our First and Second Shift Diploma Courses into Degree Courses?
We were running First Shift (180) and Second Shift (120), currently the portal shows a
single number with both the Intakes. Because of this, we are getting deficiencies.
Please change the Intake as that of the last year
Our Institution wants to make admission under Lateral Entry in Engineering and
Technology. Is there any provision in APH 2021-22?
Whether Lateral Entry is permitted in Diploma?
Whether students from SAARC Countries/ Foreign Nationals are permitted to admit
under Lateral Entry in Engineering Courses?
We have an Approved Intake of 60 seats in Electronics and Communication
Engineering in UG Course. Now we want to reduce the Intake by 30 in Electronics and
Communication Engineering and in lieu of it can we would like to add the one Division of
30 students in lateral entry in Engineering UG Course.
Whether our Institution can start ITI with same Infrastructure available in our
Polytechnic?
What is the duration of MCA Course? Lateral Entry Permissible in MCA?
For Under Graduate Degree Programme in Engineering Technology, whether Diploma
qualified students will also be considered on par with students passed 10+2
examination?
How do we implement the rationalization of nomenclature suggested by the AICTE in
Management Programme?
Our Institution has six UG Engineering Courses. How many Seminar Halls we need for
running UG Programme?
Do we need Research Laboratory for each PG Course?
How the Mega and Metro Cities, Urban Area and Rural Area have been determined?
We are running Five PG Courses in Civil Engineering. How many Professors with Ph.D.
qualification are required?
What is the Faculty Student ratio to be maintained by the Institutions Deemed to be
Universities/ Institutions having Accreditation/ Autonomous status?
In Appendix10 subscription of journals, what is N?
With reference to APH 2021-22, whether subscription of E-journal is mandatory.
I want to know whether any applicant of the Organization can be the owner of the land
or else if any member of the organization can give a lease to the applicant society.
Moreover, does the lease agreement needed to be registered or not.
Is it essential to have representative of AICTE in the Board of Governors?
Please clarify the qualification and age limit of Adjunct Faculty. Whether a same Adjunct
Faculty can be associated with different Institutions? Is there any restriction for
Maximum no of Institutions that an Adjunct Faculty should be associated?
Can we charge the Fee as per the Recommendation of National Fee Committee given
How much is the Development Fee is recommended by the National Fee Committee?
What is the procedure for conversion of Technical Institution into Technical Campus?
We want to change the details which are non-editable/ read-only. How this can be
done?
Whether Affidavit can be submitted in e-Stamp Paper?
Is TER Charges refundable if application is rejected?
When we have established our Institution in 1980, we have got the Completion
Certificate issued by the then Competent Authority, but we don’t have Occupancy
Certificate for 2018. How can we apply for EoA?
How to get a copy of Corrigendum EoA / Corrigendum LoA in case of corrections made
in EoA or LoA from AICTE Web Portal?
Whether e-Affidavit is mandatory?
How can an Institution apply for National Digital Library?
What is National Academic Depository? How to apply?
What is Food and Safety Act 2006? How to comply with its norms?
Is it necessary to provide details for Quality Education Mandate?
Is it permitted to change Minority status to Non Minority?
If a Central University taking approval for engineering programme at PG Level only and
running Management, MCA programme is it mandatory to take approval of AICTE for all
other technical programme?
Is DSC mandatory for submission of online application for New and Existing
Institutions?
Existing institutions can start a new programme/ level in engineering?
Whether AICTE will give approval for Technical courses at Diploma /Degree level in
Regional language?
Are there any TER charges applicable for starting Vocational courses under NSQF?
Is it possible to have a Collaboration and Twinning programme between Two Indian
Institutions/ Indian and Foreign Universities?
What are the requirements of Infrastructure for Online education compared to ODL
education?
Whether Govt aided Technical institutions running self-financing courses need to pay
TER Charges ?
Whether TIN/GST number for any Industry is Mandatory in order to have MoU with
AICTE approved Institutions?
Whether Lateral entry admission is considered for the enrolment calculation under
reduction in intake category of punitive action.
Whether any institution can conduct a course or program affiliated to two different
Universities?
Clarify whether a two years old AICTE approved institution with intake of 120 can apply
for increase in intake up to 180 seats without NBA Accreditation?
Whether Standalone B.HMCT college can apply for closure and start New program in
the same establishment ?
What is the procedure to start an MCA Program in a University?
Is it necessary to have two seminar halls and an Office with 300 Sq.Mts for running
MBA and MCA Courses.
A State Govt University running 3 Programs (MBA, MCA and B. Arch). Is it necessary to
take approval of AICTE for running these Programmes?
Provide a list of courses / areas that can be offered / started in ODL / OL mode by
existing Standalone Engineering Institutions.
After the Merger of two courses under the same Major Disciple as per 2.18.1.c, Page
No 59, what will be the allowed maximum intake?
Courses on Emerging areas like AI & DS, CSE (DS), CSE (AI & ML) etc. are not
mentioned in Annexure 6 of APH under Major Discipline CS & E. Whether All such
courses will be permitted as emerging area courses under the Major Discipline of CS &
E in A/Y 2021-22 or NOT?
We would like to apply for two new courses, one in B.E CSE (AI and ML) and the other
one in B.E CSE (Data Science) under the CSE department which is already running
B.E. CSE for which SAR submitted to NBA.
Please enlightened us, regarding how to produce quality students with good technical
knowledge
As there are no parameters mentioned in the hand book for Pharmacy. How can we fill
the extension of approval form for Pharmacy?
Is it possible to get approval for New course in Emerging Area by reducing intake from
180 to 120 in the Mechanical Course (without NBA)?
What is the procedure for merging UG and PG courses running in the same institute
with one college ID ?
AICTE has made it mandatory for the class 3 DSC, for 2 members. Whether the DSC
should be procured in the same name for both or separately as specified by AICTE
Whether a Standalone Architecture Institution approved by the Council of Architecture,
can be merged with the parent institution approved by AICTE.
Please specify the eligibility conditions for grant of approval for ODL / OL courses.
UG engineering college having sanctioned intake of 300 with 5 courses. Whether New
course with intake 60 by reducing intake of two existing courses by 30 each can be
added?
Will there be any decision on awarding Autonomy for Polytechnics?
Whether the Institute can apply for three courses in Emerging Areas like Data Science,
Artificial Intelligence, IOT, Cybersecurity etc.
Can we start diploma level courses in areas other than Emerging /Multidisciplinary
Areas?
The faculty to students ratio will be 1:20 for 2021-22 and 1:15 from 2022-23 for
Accredited and Autonomous Colleges.
Please allow same courses at diploma & degree levels in engineering with a total
maximum intake of 120 (Diploma + Degree) without any additional requirement of
laboratories, Workshop, Seminar hall and NBA.
Can we go for restoration of intake of only a few courses ?
Which Norms Architecture Colleges Should follow for taking AICTE Approval (Not
mentioned in APH 2020-21)?
AICTE granted approval for Vocational Courses last year, but the State Government
does not publish it in their GR. Accordingly, the University NOT given affiliation to these
Vocational courses. So what is the status of these courses in 2021-22
Can we apply for a New Course in an existing Diploma college within Maximum Allowed
Intake?
The Mechanical Engineering course is Accredited by NBA is having 180 Intake now. Isit
possible to start a new course in an Emerging Area by reducing the intake from 180 to
120 in Mechanical Engineering?
Whether reducing seats in MCA and MBA can be used for additional courses in B. Tech
Program?
Earlier Physics and mathematics were mandatory subjects in 10+2 level to take
admission to Engineering. Are these subjects NOT mandatory from 2021-22?
Can Autonomous and Non-autonomous Institutions under the same TRUST in the same
city be merged ?
Whether Institute can Increase the intake more than last academic year 2020 -21by
applying for new courses in the Emerging Areas in this academic year 2021-22
What are the TER Charges for reinstatement (Restoration) of seats from 30 to 60?
Within the total intake of the institute, can we reduce the intake in any one of the UG
courses and increase the intake (using reduced one) in another UG program. Is it
Possible ?
During 2010 when AICTE made online provisions for EOA, our clerical staff wrongly
entered the land area. Now how to correct it (land details not editable for institutes to
change).
Can we adjust 180 seats in Emerging Areas by reducing intake of 180 through closure
of course/ reduction in course keeping the intake as intact?
Is it possible to merge Diploma Institution into Degree Institution under same trust or
Society?
Our institute is under Extended EoA, shall we require to apply for EoA annually. As per
APH 2021-22, in which category we should apply (EOA based on self-disclosure or
Extended EoA) ?
We have closed our MCA Course During 2012-13. Now We wish to Offer an MCA
Course from the Academic Year 2021-22. Shall we apply as New Institutions or Existing
Institutions?
When will inspection for Merger of Institutions take place (after shifting the facilities from
child institution to parent institution or before)?
In case of merger, kindly clarify whether facilities such as lab equipment need to be
shifted from child to parent institute before EVC visit or after approval it has to be
shifted?
The Nomenclature of PGDM Part Time and Executive PGDM programme is NOT
available in the nomenclature list.
Do we require approval from the CoA for a diploma in Architecture?
What is the Student Faculty Ratio for MBA programmes?
If there is a break in EOA for an MBA program for more than six years and IF it is a
State University and MCA Department has AICTE approval. What is the procedure for
getting AICTE approval for an MBA program?
Want to start a standalone PGDM college using extra land with us. The land is in the
name of society but a building plan in the name of an existing college. Can we need a
building plan in the name of a new Institute?
What is the eligibility criteria for standalone ODL Institutes to apply for EOA for AY 2021-
Can a Pharmacy Institute approved by PCI apply for EoA from AICTE?
For Category I & II Autonomous Institutions (DUs) for starting new programs or
increasing the seats is NBA accreditation compulsory.
Can we start new program MCA in existing engineering institutes having already 300
seats
UG Engineering College has a sanctioned intake of 300 with 5 courses. Can we add a
new course with intake 60 by reducing intake of two existing courses by 30 each?
Is the TER Charges applicable for reinstatement (restoration) of seats from 30 to 60
Is an PGDM institute get additional 60 seats for this year 2021-22, without NBA
Is it possible to modify land details? Because the current land norm is less than that was
required at the time of starting of the college. Please allow us to modify, so that we can
use Excess Land.
We are having a total intake of 240.we would like to restore the seat of Electrical Branch
from 30 to 60.which documents are required? what is the difference between the
reinstatement and restoration of seats
Whether an institute can apply for an Emerging Area Course by closing the Exiting
course?
To start MCA in an existing aided college, AICTE approval should be taken first or
University Approval?
This year, in the Nomenclature list, a few courses (19 out of 261) are marked with star
(*) mark, indicating these courses as Emerging / Multi-disciplinary areas. Does it mean,
we can choose for new courses only from these 19 courses?
We have only traditional courses in B.E. Level and got less admission i.e. less than 50
% hence we like to reduce 60 seats of a traditional course from 120 seats to offer
Emerging course with 60 seats. Hence request you to relax the condition of minimum 50
% admission last year given as Note in page no.55 of APH 2021-22 in Clause 2.14.4 (b)
for effective utilization of infrastructure.
Regarding New Course addition, our college has four accredited NBA course, without
changing the overall intake of the college, shall we reduce one division in existing
courses? and shall we able to start new course in Emerging field but available as listed
in Emerging Area course list specified in AICTE Handbook 2021-22
Can we transfer the seats from one course to the other, like 30 seats from MBA(IT) to
MCA?
Institution having Autonomous status can apply for grant of approval for ODL
We reduced intake last year in Civil Mech and ECE. Are we eligible to apply for
additional courses in Emerging areas like Artificial intelligence, Data science etc. without
NBA?
Can we apply for two Management Courses in New College?
For Merger of Institution, who has to apply? Is it the Parent Institution or the Child
Institution?
Is it mandatory to get the approval from COA for a Diploma in Architecture course?
What is the procedure to Reduce the Land area? We having enough Land as per
norms, is it possible to reduce it sir
We want to reduce our B. Tech EEE course intake from 60 to 0
Can we Increase intake of course from 30 to 60 without the NBA? (Our sanctioned
intake is more than 300, old Polytechnic & running 7 courses).
We are a NAAC accredited MBA Institute affiliated to the University of Mumbai. If we
wish to start an MBA (IEV) which is one of the Emerging areas, Is it necessary for us to
have NBA accreditation?
We are Autonomous and have NAAC accreditation A+ grade till 2022 pl clarify whether
our TER charges will be waived in case of Extended EOA
Can we open a new course within approved sanctioned intake without NBA?
Emerging Area courses introduced last year (CSE-AI, CSE-AIML) will continue this year
in addition to * marked course this year?
We are an Autonomous Institution, and want to apply for ME Programme in CSE (AI &
ML) but this Programme is not offered by the affiliating university Anna University, Can
AICTE will permit us to start the Programme.
